item.salem.eternal_feast_belt.tooltip: When damaged by a zombie it will provide you with saturation. If it's a Zombie Villager it will turn into a Villager.
item.salem.bone_shield_hand.tooltip: It will store time to give you damage protection. The more time you have stored, the more time you will need to increase that protection.
item.salem.hellish_bargain_ring.tooltip: Counts as wearing gold for Piglins and will give you double bartering.
item.salem.scorching_aura_ring.tooltip: Sets mobs on fire when they hit you.
item.salem.chilling_aura_necklace.toolti: Slows mobs when they hit you.
item.salem.deathly_chargers_feet.tooltip: Increases player running speed whilst running. The more you run, the faster you will go.
item.salem.withering_touch_hand.tooltip: Grants wither damage immunity and has a chance to wither your enemies.
item.salem.unhallowed_cross_charm.toolti: Stores multiple Totems of Undying and uses them on death.
item.salem.tome_of_the_damned_charm.tool: Chance to charm undead mobs that attack you to fight on your side.
item.salem.nightmarish_wings_back.toolti: Allows you to fly like an elytra does.
tooltip.salem.only_night: Can only be used at night
config.salem.enable_random_raids.tooltip: Enable random raids around players similar at how phantoms spawn
